casebody.data:
SUGAR CREEK CHARTER SCHOOL, INC., Kennedy Charter School, Crossroads Charter School, Carolina International School, and Metrolina Regional Scholars Academy
v.
The CHARLOTTE-MECKLENBURG BOARD OF EDUCATION and Peter C. Gorman, Superintendent in his Official Capacity, d/b/a "Charlotte-Mecklenburg Schools". No. 116P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. James G. Middlebrooks, Charlotte, Justin D. Howard, Raleigh, Jill R. Wilson, Robert J. King, III, Elizabeth V. LaFollette, Greensboro, for Charlotte-Mecklenburg BOE, et al. Richard A. Vinroot, Charlotte, for Charter Schools. Ann L. Majestic, Lisa Lukasik, Raleigh, Allison B. Schafer, for School Boards Assoc. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 655 S.E.2d 850 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th day of March 2008 by Defendants in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of August 2008."
